name: symptom_search_pipeline
description: Multi-layer GPT pipeline for symptom extraction, medicine recommendation, and natural language response generation. Processes user conversations to extract symptoms, recommend medicines, search Amazon, and provide natural language responses.

function.name: process_symptom_conversation
function.description: Process user conversation through multi-layer GPT pipeline to extract symptoms, recommend medicines, search Amazon, and generate natural language response

conversation.description: The user's conversation or description of their symptoms and health concerns (e.g., 'I've been having headaches and fever for the past 2 days')

max_results.description: Maximum number of product results to return per medicine (default: 5, max: 10)

request.start: I'm analyzing your symptoms and searching for relevant medicines. Please wait a moment...
request.complete: I've found some medicine recommendations based on your symptoms.
request.failed: I couldn't process your symptoms right now. Please try again later.
request.delay: I'm still analyzing your symptoms and searching for medicines. This might take a few more seconds...
